content: this pattern is for a crochet bat applique yarn worsted weight #4 yarn skill level intermediate the pattern uses crochet us terms language english free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-bat-pattern/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format video tutorial https //youtu be/6nomuszq6zs si=qpco9wnvz91ixk3l product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external websites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
